page_content: The page discusses COVID-19 vaccination strategies and procedures in the Kanton Glarus.
The page offers a job position for an IT specialist focusing on system technology, detailing the requirements and application process.
The page discusses changes to the tax law in Kanton Glarus, including the introduction of online tax filing.
The page introduces a new mobile website for the Kanton Glarus, detailing its features and how to use it.
The page discusses additional funding for COVID-19 vaccinations in Kanton Glarus.
The page introduces a new mobile website for the Kanton Glarus, detailing its features and how to use it.
The page discusses the role of IT solutions in the administrative restructuring of the Kanton Glarus.
